text: Yevreyi ta Khrystyyanyn skazaly, "My ye BOZHI dity ta Yoho kokhanyy." Skazhitʹ, "Chomu todi Vin karaye vas dlya vashykh hrikhiv? Vy vyhlyadayete tilʹky humans yak inshyy humans Vin stvoryuvav." Vin probachaye whomever Vin wills ta karaye whomever Vin wills. Do BOHA nalezhytʹ suverenitetu neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy, ta yomu yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnu dolyu
